channel.title: Insane-F2PK A server Must try!
channel.description:
Hey my name is Matt, AKA Insane Pk. Most of you probably remember me from being mod on King Pk. I left and decided to go solo.This is the first tutorial i have made so I am going to advertise my server now. Far more updates are soon to come. I am offering some start out cash and a few items for new players. Hope to see you soon! Commands: ::edge,::online,::ongame,::fatigue,::setdef,::skull,::dm After 1 Day of Advertisement: [IMG]http://i696.photobucket.com/albums/vv328/insanepk/screenshot23.png[/img] After 4 days of Advertisement: [IMG]http://i696.photobucket.com/albums/vv328/insanepk/screenshot5-2.png[/img] Online List command: [IMG]http://i696.photobucket.com/albums/vv328/insanepk/screenshot13.png[/img] 1 [IMG]http://i696.photobucket.com/albums/vv328/insanepk/screenshot8-2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i696.photobucket.com/albums/vv328/insanepk/screenshot9-2.png[/img]
Special Thanks to Adam and Chase for the good work in helping me code! I came to Moparscape clueless now I have answer's and new skills!
UPDATE! rares have been wiped. will be hosting drop party in all time zones. X admin fucked my economy its fixed now~
ok so im making 2 gangs. Pure Killa'z, and Death Row. I will be removing the dragon 2h. Each gang will have there own weapons. For example, Killa'z 2h and Death Row 2H. They will be the same power and aim, but different colors. I will have a npc for you to trade 2hs in for the right gangs 2h, for all the 2hs you pk. The rune 2h will be the same power and aim as the gangs for the ppl that dont want to be in any gang. Post suggestions on the new weapon power and aim. Pk Point system will have a whole new set up alot better!!! Range exp rate will be increased. Mining and smithing exp rates will be decreased a little bit. You will no longer be able to log out while running in the wild. Event cert and pk points trade in npcs will have new items and trade in amounts! All shop prices will be changed and set at a good economic level. Custom Rares will be added such as Christmas cookies. Custom party hats! Custom Robes! Thats not all! Strength potions will be removed. Marijuana and blunts will be added to take place of the regular strength potion. For example you click use blunt with marijuana , it then says you split the blunt and roll a fatty! Then after its rolled, You click on it to get a dose like a potion. each time you click it the blunt gets smaller. You get to hit the blunt 5 times before its gone.! Far more this is just a sneak brief!
New client 6/4/09 back online

item.title: Insane-F2PK A server Must try!
item.dc:creator: @insane_pk insane pk
item.description:
@insane_pk wrote:

I just went through the banks and inventory, everyone that had outrageous mills after mills of runes and shit i changed to a decent amount. That way its fair to everyone. No more crazy amounts of runes or cash or arrows will be givein out.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 06, 2009, 03:27:19 pm[/size][hr]New update: 1 defense Death Zone. Brother Omad will transport you there it allows only 1 defense to enter!
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 06, 2009, 04:44:45 pm[/size][hr]new client graphics!


[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 09, 2009, 10:43:20 am[/size][hr]Varrock kingdom has been turned into a whole training grounds downstairs to the top. Will be adding more npcs. Adding a delay so you cant run and log out while pking. Server play area is being expanded, will be active in fally,varrock,edge,lumby, bb vill, draynor, working my way around the server. T h u g and whine event status has been revoked, + lots more updates coming shortly!

Read full topic

item.title: Insane-F2PK A server Must try!
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

insane pk:

Just giving a start to the first players to the game after that i am not. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 05, 2009, 11:08:10 pm[/size][hr]New UPDATE. ::DM command. Teleports 2 people and 2 people only to the mage arena to fight. When you do ::dm, it counds down saying you will be teleported to the death match in 15 seconds. then down to 1. Then it takes you to the mage arena. If more than 2 try to enter using the dm command, it says 2 people are already in the death match. And after one has died if someone trys the command again it says You will be teleported to the Death Match in 15 minutes.

Sounds great ^^

Read full topic

item.title: Insane-F2PK A server Must try!
item.dc:creator: @Maxillion Maxillion
item.description:
@Maxillion wrote:

Umm, I don’t think you can call this an F2p server. I’d say its almost-f2p at best. Dragon 2h AND Klank’s? Not only that, but to support pking in an F2p(ish) server, you need to reduce xp rates. I went on forum about ~30 minutes and you gave me a d2h (ew), 10m, and alot of fire blast casts. Bad economy so far, only flats pking going on, p2p items…Might need a bit of fixing up.

Read full topic
